command.gang.not_in_gang: %prefix%You are not in a gang. Type %color.command%/gang create [name]%color.default% to create one.
command.gang.create.restricted: %prefix%Gang creation is restricted to {green}Dedicated Supporters{grey} for our {blue}Beta{grey} test. Become one at {green}https://edgm.rs/donate{grey}.
command.gang.invite.max_invites: %prefix%Your gang has reached the maximum of %color.number%{0} %color.default%invite%s%.
command.gang.disband.warning:
%prefix%{darkred}WARNING: {red}This action is irreversible.
{darkred}- {red}All players will be removed from the gang
{darkred}- {red}All gang perks and statistics will be removed
{yellow}NOTE: {grey}You can {white}/gang transfer{grey} ownership instead, if you wish this gang to continue.
%prefix%{red}Type {darkred}/gang disband confirm{red} to confirm.
command.rank.created: Created the rank "%color.special%{0}%color.default%" with no permissions.
command.rank.cannot_delete: %prefix%There are players with the rank "%color.special%{0}%color.default%", you must reassign them first.
command.rank.rename_prompt: %prefix%Please use %color.command%/gang rank rename {0} [new name]%color.default% to rename the rank.
command.transfer.subordinate: %prefix%You can only transfer ownership to someone with the "%color.special%{0}%color.default%" rank.
command.coinflip.sent: %prefix%You sent a coinflip request to %color.target%{0}%color.default% for %color.currency%{1} %currency%%s%.
command.coinflip.received:
%prefix%%color.target%{0}%color.default% sent you a coinflip request for %color.currency%{1} %currency%%s%.
%prefix%Type %color.command%/coinflip yes%color.default% to accept.
command.coinflip.cooldown: %prefix%You must wait before sending another coinflip request to %color.target%{0}%color.default%.
command.coinflip.pending: %prefix%%color.target%{0}%color.default% already has a pending coinflip request.
command.coinflip.no_pending: %prefix%You have no pending coinflip requests. Send one with %color.ccommand%/coinflip [player] [amount]%color.default%.
command.coinflip.invalid: %prefix%This coinflip request is no longer valid.
generic.player.steam_not_found: %prefix%The Steam ID "%color.emph%{0}%color.default%" has not played on the server.
generic.no_permission: %prefix%{red}You do not have permission to use this command.
generic.no_permission.rank: %prefix%{red}You must be {darkred}{0}{red} to use this command.
gang.not_found.closest: %prefix%Could not find a unique gang using "%color.special%{0}%color.default%". Did you mean "%color.special%{1}%color.default%"?
gang.invited:
%prefix%%color.target%{0}%color.default% invited you to join their %color.gang%{1}%color.default% gang.
%prefix%Type %color.command%/gang join {1}%color.default% to accept the invite.
gang.transferred: %color.target%{0}%color.default% transferred ownership of the gang to %color.target%{1}%color.default%.
perk.missing: %prefix%Your gang does not have the %color.special%{0}%color.default% perk.
perk.display.chat.toggled: %prefix%You {0}%color.default% your gang chat showing in chat.
perk.display.scoreboard.toggled: %prefix%You {0}%color.default% your gang tag showing in the scoreboard.
perk.purchased: %color.target%{0}%color.default% purchased the %color.special%{1}%color.default% perk for your gang.
eco.purchased.with_gang: %prefix%{green}Successfully%color.default% purchased item using gang %currency%%s%, you now have %color.currency%{0} %currency%%s%%color.default%.
eco.purchased.with_gang.with_item: %prefix%{green}Successfully%color.default% purchased %color.emph%{0}%color.default% using gang %currency%%s%, your gang now has %color.currency%{1} %currency%%s%%color.default%.
eco.purchased.with_both: %prefix%{green}Successfully%color.default% purchased item (wiping out gang funds), you now have %color.currency%{0} %currency%%s%%color.default%.
eco.purchased.with_both.with_item: %prefix%{green}Successfully%color.default% purchased %color.emph%{0}%color.default% (wiping out gang funds), you now have %color.currency%{1} %currency%%s%%color.default%.
rank.cannot_edit: %prefix%You cannot edit %color.special%{0}%color.default% as they are higher than you.
rank.demote.below_lowest: %prefix%You cannot demote %color.target%{0}%color.default% any further, use %color.command%/gang kick {1}%color.default% to remove them from the gang.
rank.cannot.owner: %prefix%You cannot {0} as the owner, use %color.command%/gang transfer <player>%color.default% to transfer ownership.
command.invite.doorpolicy: %prefix%Your door policy must be set to invite-only to send invites.
